hymn.title: The Lord is my strength and my song
hymn.chords: | C - - - | C - C/G - | C - C/G - | C - C/E - | Dm - - - | G - G/D - | G - G/D - | G - G7/B - | C - C/G - | C - C/G - | C - C/G - | C - C/E - | Dm - - - | G - G/D - | G - G/D - | G - G7/B - | C - C7 - | F - G7/F - | Em - Am - | Dm - G7 - | C - C7/E - | F - G7/F - | Em - Am - | Dm - G7 - | F/C - - - | C - - - | C - F/C - | C - C/G - | C - C/E - | Dm - Dm/A - | Dm - Dm/F - | G - G/D - | G7 - G7/B - | C - C/G - | C - C/G - | C - C/G - | C - C/E - | Dm - Dm/A - | Dm - Dm/F - | G - G/D - | G7 - G7/B - | C - - - |

layout.singingstanza: The Lord is my strength and my song. He's be -- come my sal -- va -- tion. The Lord is my strength and my song. He's be -- come my sal -- va -- tion. The Lord is my strength and my song. He's be -- come my sal -- va -- tion. The Lord is my strength and my song. He's be -- come my sal -- va -- tion. He is my God, and I will praise Him. My fa -- ther's God, and I'll e -- xalt Him. He is my God, and I will praise Him. My fa -- ther's God, and I'll e -- xalt Him. Thou in Thy mer -- cy Hast led forth Thy peo -- ple, Led forth Thy peo -- ple, Which Thou hast re -- deemed. Thou hast guid -- ed them, Guid -- ed them in Thy strength Un -- to Thy ho -- ly ha -- bit -- a -- tion.

lyrics.stanza: The Lord is my strength and my song. He's become my salvation. The Lord is my strength and my song. He's become my salvation. The Lord is my strength and my song. He's become my salvation. The Lord is my strength and my song. He's become my salvation.
He is my God, and I will praise Him. My father's God, and I'll exalt Him. He is my God, and I will praise Him. My father's God, and I'll exalt Him.
Thou in Thy mercy Hast led forth Thy people, Led forth Thy people, Which Thou hast redeemed. Thou hast guided them, Guided them in Thy strength Unto Thy holy habitation.
